entry.title: $2200 // vintage meets contemporary 1 bedroom in bedstuy brooklyn NO FEE
entry.content:
Stunning 1 bedroom,1 bathroom apartment has a grandeur fusion of vintage charm and contemporary elegancy, and situated in the charming Bedstuy neighborhood.

Listing Details 
Date Available- September 1st 
Listing Price- $2,200
Layout- 2 Rooms /1 Bathroom  

Features:
Exposed brick
Converted fireplace
Archetypal carved wooden art
Hardwood and tiled floors throughout
Modern kitchen with SS appliances
Full bathroom with soaking tub and vanity
Laundry in building
Pets Allowed
NO FEE


Location:

Close to S, A, C, and LIRR trains
Surrounded by grocery stores, multiple restaurants, Deli's, bakeries, cafes, pharmacies, Planet Fitness, Brower Park, Herbert Von King Park, Citi Bikes, and GNC.



Contact me for a viewing.

entry.title: $2500 // LOFT apartment ___ 20ft high ceiling __ NO FEE ---- new building
entry.content:
This unit has an amazing open-loft feel, and an over-abundance of windows allows light to stream into the living area all day long.
The open kitchen concept comes with stainless appliances, complete with dishwasher, and plenty of cabinet space.
Traveling up the open staircase brings you to the ample sized bedroom and gives you an amazing view of the surrounding neighborhood. The building comes with laundry in the basement and a shared roof deck for your use.

Please call for a viewing. show contact info

entry.content:
NO FEE By Appointment Only
